mapper.insert: insert into FILE_TBL(FILE_NM, FILE_PATH, FILE_CRT_DATE) values (#{file_nm}, #{file_path}, SYSDATE());
insert into MEM_TBL (MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, MEM_NICK, MEM_NM, FILE_IDX) values (#{mem_id}, hex(aes_encrypt(#{mem_pwd}, #{pwd_key})), #{mem_nick}, #{mem_nm}, LAST_INSERT_ID());
mapper.select: select M.MEM_ID, M.MEM_NICK, M.MEM_NM from MEM_TBL M where M.MEM_ID like CONCAT('%', #{mem_id}, '%') limit 10 offset #{offset};
select M.MEM_ID, M.MEM_NICK, M.MEM_NM, M.MEM_STAT, M.ACVT, F.FILE_PATH from MEM_TBL M inner join FILE_TBL F on M.FILE_IDX = F.FILE_IDX where M.MEM_ID = #{mem_id};

select M.MEM_ID, M.MEM_NICK, M.MEM_NM, M.MEM_STAT, F.FILE_PATH from MEM_TBL M inner join FILE_TBL F on M.FILE_IDX = F.FILE_IDX where M.MEM_ID = #{mem_id} and M.ACVT = 1 and M.MEM_PWD = hex(aes_encrypt(#{mem_pwd}, #{pwd_key}));
select FT.FILE_NM, FT.FILE_PATH from MEM_TBL MT inner join FILE_TBL FT on MT.FILE_IDX = FT.FILE_IDX where MT.MEM_ID = #{value}
